title: Understanding Opioid Intoxication
text: Opioid intoxication can affect both physical and mental states. Consider how opioids might alter mood and behavior.

title: Focus on Mental Effects
text: Think about how opioids might impact a person's emotions and mental processes. What changes might occur in their mood or judgment?

hintAnswer: apathy, dysphoria, psychomotor retardation or agitation, and impaired judgment
title: Identifying Symptoms
text: Which of the following symptoms are associated with opioid intoxication?
choices: muscle tension, headaches, stomach cramps, increased appetite, insomnia, depression, and slower thinking
apathy, dysphoria, psychomotor retardation or agitation, and impaired judgment
